title: Harvest Basil Grow Kit
description:
Let the good times grow at home. Botanical bar essentials combined with a cocktail recipe will keep you growing and toasting. This self-watering kit is equipped with a passive hydroponic system that wicks water and nutrients to the plant's roots. Kit includes organic basil seeds, bamboo pot, stainless steel jigger, hardwood muddler, instruction manual and cocktail recipe. Made in the USA. 

Pot: 6 x 3 1/2 in. 

Gift Box: 10 3/4 x 11 in.
